column5: Tips & Tricks From a Pro NL

For 3rd job, prioritize shadow partner 1st (1 or 2 pts in flash jump is okay, but don't get carried away), then avenger for mobbing, with some more FJ. And also max alchemist before 4th job! After that max shadow web, then whatever you'd like.
4th Job: Triple Throw > Shadow Stars > Shadow Shifter > Ninja STORM (not ambush) > MW10
Headless Horsemen are great NX and exp at lv 80 (max shadow partner). Make sure to check ALL the maps, there's a lot where it can spawn
A good way to save mesos on getting throwing stars is hunting them!

column8: Leprechauns in NLC crimsonwood forest are plentiful and have good chance at dropping steely throwing knives and green bandanas which you can sell in FM along with other items that you can NPC for extra mesos! You can also save mesos farming ilbi throwing stars from Zombie Mushmom and regular MushMom and you'll also have chances at gaining NX while doing so!

column5: Woah it's like minecraft, stuff hidden behind a picture
